```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
df <- read.csv("VAPS_Data_per_Artwork.csv", sep = ";")
```

```{r}
df <- df |>
  select("Picture_Number", "All_Valence_M", "All_Valence_SD", "All_Arousal_M", "All_Arousal_SD", "All_Familiarity_M", "All_Familiarity_SD")
```

```{r}
df <- df |>
  mutate_all(~ as.numeric(gsub(",", ".", .)))
```

```{r}
arousal_vs_valence <- ggplot(df, aes(All_Valence_M, All_Arousal_M)) +
  geom_point(size = 1) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", colour = "blue", fill = "lightblue") +
  labs(x = "valence (negative - positive)", y = "arousal (calm - exciting)") +
  theme_minimal()

arousal_vs_valence
```

```{r}
cor(df$All_Arousal_M, df$All_Valence_M)
```
